name: dfop

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cop(c0, c1), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Value of an ordered pair when the arguments are sets, with the conclusion corresponding to Kuratowski's original definition. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-1998.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
